The clonal structure of each coral population was examined by identifying the same MLGs based on 8 microsatellite loci; these were identified as possible clones (asexually reproduced by fragmentation), and all except one were excluded from subsequent analyses. The inbreeding coefficient of a population ( F
IS ), was evaluated with GenAlEx ver. 6.502
44 . Genotypic linkage disequilibrium across 8 loci was examined using GENEPOP on the web (ver. 4.0.10)
45 by estimating exact P values using the Markov chain method with 10,000 dememorization steps, 1,000 batches, and 10,000 iterations per batch.
